title: Get started today and stop suffering with appointments
description: We know how difficult it is to reconcile schedules, especially in a complex environment where people are working remotely. But scheduling your meetings doesn't have to be a pain. Now you can solve the problem with a simple tool.

articles.title: Meetings the way you need them
articles.description: Define when and how meetings can be scheduled.

articles.title: Invite whoever you want
articles.description: Share your schedule securely with multiple people.
